items.title: pop-cosmos: Redshifts and physical properties of KiDS-1000 galaxies
items.summary: arXiv:2602.03930v1 Announce Type: new Abstract: Principled Bayesian inference of galaxy properties has not previously been performed for wide-area weak lensing surveys with millions of sources. We address this gap by applying the pop-cosmos generative model to perform spectral en…
